#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0);
 
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long
 
int main()
{
	int N;
	scanf("%d", &N);
	
	int fi = 0;
	int tee = 0;
	int to = 0;
	while(N - 5 >= 0 && N > 0) {
		fi++;
		N = N - 5;
	}
	
	while(N - 3 >= 0 && N > 0) {
		tee++;
		N = N - 3;
	}
	
	while(N - 2 >= 0 && N > 0) {
		to++;
		N = N - 2;
	}
	
	cout<< fi << "\n" << tee << "\n" << to << "\n" << N << "\n";
	
	return 0;
}
